section.name: WOLips
section.p: wizards popup manipulating the build process bugs and known issues inside WOLips

subsection.name: WOFramework
subsection.p: In the menu navigate to File-New-Project.
The new project wizard appears. The available options under WO 5.* are a WOFramework or a WOApplication. Please Select WOFramework and continue with clicking the next button.
Give your project a name. Continue with clicking the next button.
Select use source folder in project. Continue with new folder.
Enter src. This have to be src. Close The dialog with ok.
